com.octo.utils
Class FilterConfigUtils

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.octo.utils.FilterConfigUtils
public class FilterConfigUtils
extends java.lang.Object

A class that provides methods to extract init parameters from a FilterConfig

Version:
$Id: FilterConfigUtils.java,v 1.2 2004/02/12 20:40:15 sbrunot Exp $
Author:
Sebastien Brunot

Method Detail

getStringInitParameter

public static java.lang.String getStringInitParameter(javax.servlet.FilterConfig theFilterConfig,
                                                      java.lang.String theInitParameterName,
                                                      boolean isMandatory)
                                               throws javax.servlet.ServletException
Get a String init parameter from a FilterConfig

Parameters:
theFilterConfig - the FilterConfig from wich the parameter should be extracted
theInitParameterName - the name of the init parameter
isMandatory - a boolean indicating if the init parameter is mandatory
Returns:
the init parameter value as a string, or null if this init parameter is not defined but not mandatory
Throws:
javax.servlet.ServletException - is the initParameter is undefined whereas mandatory (a message is provided in the exception)

getIntegerInitParameter

public static java.lang.Integer getIntegerInitParameter(javax.servlet.FilterConfig theFilterConfig,
                                                        java.lang.String theInitParameterName,
                                                        boolean isMandatory,
                                                        int theMinValue,
                                                        int theMaxValue)
                                                 throws javax.servlet.ServletException
Get an Integer init parameter from a FilterConfig

Parameters:
theFilterConfig - the FilterConfig from wich the parameter should be extracted
theInitParameterName - the name of the init parameter
isMandatory - a boolean indicating if the init parameter is mandatory
theMinValue - the minimum value the init parameter can have
theMaxValue - the maximum value the init parameter can have
Returns:
the init parameter value as an Integer, or null if this Integer parameter is not defined but not mandatory
Throws:
javax.servlet.ServletException - if :
  • the initParameter is undefined whereas mandatory
  • the initParameter is defined but is not an integer value
  • the initParameter is < minValue or > maxValue
(a message is provided in the exception for each case).

getBooleanInitParameter

public static boolean getBooleanInitParameter(javax.servlet.FilterConfig theFilterConfig,
                                              java.lang.String theInitParameterName,
                                              boolean isMandatory)
                                       throws javax.servlet.ServletException
Get a boolean init parameter from a FilterConfig

Parameters:
theFilterConfig - the FilterConfig from wich the parameter should be extracted
theInitParameterName - the name of the init parameter
isMandatory - a boolean indicating if the init parameter is mandatory
Returns:
the init parameter value as a boolean, or null if this init parameter is not defined but not mandatory
Throws:
javax.servlet.ServletException - is the initParameter is undefined whereas mandatory (a message is provided in the exception)
